title: Open a nested modal dialog  in reading mode
task: Open a nested modal dialog
setupScriptDescription: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the 'Add' button
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Add' button inside a modal dialog, open the nested 'Address Added' dialog.
assertion3: 1:Dialog Description is conveyed as: 'The address you provided has been added to your list of delivery addresses. It is ready for immediate use. If you wish to remove it, you can do so from your profile.
assertion4: Role of the focused element ('button') is conveyed
assertion5: Name of the focused element ('OK') is conveyed
